name: Bengali Baby Names
description: Attractive features of this App are: - Its very user friendly and also have a attractive design. - It has a great collection of Bengali Baby Names of boys and girls. - There is a listing of alphabets A to Z - You can reserve your favorite names which helps you to choose name easily - You can easily remove name from your favorite list. - You can easily search names according their alphabets.  - With this app you can easily find the meaning of your name with the help of searching options.  Tag: - Bengali cute name of boy - Muslim Baby Names - Hindu Baby Names - Muslim Baby Names in English - Muslim Baby Names in Bengali - Hindu Baby Names in English - Hindu Baby Names in Bengali - Bengali cute name of girl - Bengali Baby Names with meaning - Baby Names in Bengali  - Bangla Baby Names - Muslim Baby Names with Bengali meaning. -    -    -Hindo shisuder nam -Shishuder nam
